Melissa provides an all-in-one solution to clean, verify, standardize, and complete names, phone numbers, addresses, and emails Global Identity Verification Prevent fraud and ensure compliance with Personator World. The service consolidates data from numerous sources to verify age and national ID and compare records against government watch lists. x Prevent fraud and ensure compliance with Personator World. The service consolidates data from numerous sources to verify age and national ID and compare records against government watch lists.

Why Melissa? International Address Verification Reference Data for 240+ Countries Certified Postal Services USPS, Canada Post, Royal Mail, Eircode & Australia Post Secure & Compliant SOC 2, HIPAA / HITECH & GDPR Superior Support 99.99% Uptime & In-Country Support Experienced & Independent 35 Years of Data Quality Expertise High quality data improves your efforts in fraud prevention ,mail & fulfillment, lead generation, research & analytics, customer experience Keep your customer records clean, current, & complete for better marketing, sales & customer service. Identity Verification Manage KYC / AML compliance with identity & ID document verification. Contact Data Verification Verify addresses, email addresses & phone numbers. NCOA Change of Address Update postal addresses with moves. Data Matching & Deduplication Merge/purge duplicate records for a single customer view. Data Enrichment Add location intelligence, property & demographic details to customer records. Mailing Lists & Sales Leads Find new customers using targeted consumer & business mailing lists. High quality data improves your efforts in fraud prevention ,mail & fulfillment, lead generation, research & analytics, customer experience Keep your customer records clean, current, & complete for better marketing, sales & customer service. Contact Zone ® Contact Zone is a unique customer data management (CDM) platform that leverages the power of Melissa Data Quality within Pentaho ® Data Integration (PDI), empowering you to collect data from any source, cleanse, enrich and transform it, and immediately deliver customer insight and significant business value. Make better decisions with clean, reliable data Run data quality in Hadoop and the cloud as batch or real-time processes Easily onboard, apply standards, enforce rules , and cleanse and enrich your Big Data, and enforce standards Robust ETL & Customer Data Integration Contact Zone reads from and writes to relational databases (SQL Server ® , Oracle ® , Netezza ® , DB2 ® , etc.), fixed or delimited text files, XML, JSON, COBOL, and other file formats such as Avro ® and Parquet ® , or Hadoop ® -based NoSQL stores such as HBase ® and Hive ® . Go beyond standard ETL tools to Contact Zone's scalable and flexible management of end-to-end data flows with: Dynamic and reusable data integration templates to save time and create transformations on the fly Robust administration features like performance monitoring, job roll-back and restart, and operations made for usage auditing Enterprise-grade security including access and version controls as well as LDAP and Active Directory ® integration Contact Zone Data Quality and Enhancement Transforms Contact Zone leverages the full spectrum of Melissa's Data Quality and Enhancement solutions with the following transforms: Profiler Profiler provides intelligent data profiling to identify weak points in your data collection process, enforce business rules on incoming records and monitor improvements over time. Contact Verify Contact Verify can validate, correct and standardisedomestic and international postal addresses, email addresses and phone numbers. Global Verify Global Verify can validate, correct and standardise postal addresses, email addresses and phone numbers for 240+ countries. Personator Personator verifies identity, validates postal address, email address, and phone number, plus updates the current address for a contact and enriches records with missing email, phone, address data, and demographic info. Personator World Personator World verifies an individual's national ID, provides age verification, and watchlist/sanctions screening for fraud prevention and KYC/AML compliance. MatchUp MatchUp provides advanced deduping/matching capabilities and survivorship rules to eliminate duplicates and create a single customer view. Fuzzy Matching Fuzzy Matching provides sophisticated fuzzy matching capabilities utilizing more than 12 fuzzy matching and proprietary algorithms to identify hard-to-spot similar records. IP Locator IP Locator geolocates a given IP address and returns latitude/longitude, city, state, postal code, county, and ISP information. Business Coder Business Coder provides detailed firmographic data on over 25 million U.S. businesses – ideal for standardising business entities, consolidating records and lead scoring. Cleanser Cleanser utilises a variety of programmatic and regular expressions to quickly correct data inconsistencies.
